testprocedure.test-case-summary: This test procedure is called by a test case and is used to verify the SUTs support of the dlFullEventUpdateSubscription dialog as an OC using variables provided by the calling test case. This procedure supports verification of requirements related to user need 2.3.4.3 [Need for Planned Event Information] and is used for both valid and invalid test cases.

Step 89 CONFIGURE: Determine the number of publication message transmissions that will be received within this test. RECORD this information as: PublicationsToReceive: ${PublicationsToReceive}

Step 91 CONFIGURE: IF PublicationErrorResponseExpected is true, determine the expected error code response for this test. RECORD this information as: PublicationErrorTypeExpected: ${PublicationErrorTypeExpected}
Step 92 CONFIGURE: Define the publication response message that will be sent to the SUT. RECORD this information as: PublicationResponseMessage: ${PublicationResponseMessage}
Step 93 CONFIGURE: Determine whether the Authentication parameters need to be verified within this test. RECORD this information as: AuthenticationCheck: ${AuthenticationCheck}
Step 94 CONFIGURE: Determine whether the SUT will be allowed access to the information requested in this test. RECORD this information as: AllowAccess: ${AllowAccess}
Step 95 CONFIGURE: Define the publication message that will be sent to the SUT. RECORD this information as: SubscriptionMessage: ${SubscriptionMessage}
Step 96 CONFIGURE: Determine whether an error response message is expected for this test. RECORD this information as: SubscriptionErrorResponseExpected: ${SubscriptionErrorResponseExpected}

Step 97 CONFIGURE: IF SubscriptionErrorResponseExpected is true, determine the expected error code response for this test. RECORD this information as: SubscriptionErrorTypeExpected: ${SubscriptionErrorTypeExpected}

Step 98 SUBSCRIPTION-EC with the following parameters: DIALOG=dlFullEventUpdateSubscription SUBSCRIPTIONMESSAGE = SubscriptionMessage SUBSCRIPTIONERRORRESPONSEEXPECTED = SubscriptionErrorResponseExpected SUBSCRIPTIONERRORTYPEEXPECTED = SubscriptionErrorTypeExpected Returns: CONTINUEPUBLICATION
Step 99 IF SubscriptionErrorResponseExpected is not equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE, OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 99.1 WHILE CONTINUEPUBLICATION is equal to TRUE then CONTINUE, OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.

Step 99.1.1 PUBLICATION-EC-RECEIVE with the following parameters: DIALOG=dlFullEventUpdateUpdate PUBLICATIONSTORECEIVE = PublicationsToReceive PUBLICATIONERRORRESPONSEEXPECTED = PublicationErrorResponseExpected PUBLICATIONERRORTYPEEXPECTED = PublicationErrorTypeExpected AUTHENTICATIONCHECK = AuthenticationCheck ALLOWACCESS = AllowAccess Returns: CONTINUEPUBLICATION
Step 99.1.2 IF PublicationErrorResponseExpected is not equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE, OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 99.1.2.1 IF TMDD_N8R80_Event_Response_Plan_Identifier_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 99.1.2.1.1 VERIFY that element response-plan-id exists within each instance of fEUMsg.FEU.event-reference
Step 99.1.2.1.2 VERIFY that element response-plan-id exists within each instance of fEUMsg.FEU.other-references.other-reference.responsible-event
Step 99.1.2.1.3 VERIFY that element response-plan-id exists within each instance of fEUMsg.FEU.other-references.other-reference.related-event
Step 99.1.2.1.4 VERIFY that element response-plan-id exists within each instance of fEUMsg.FEU.other-references.other-reference.previous-event
Step 99.1.2.1.5 VERIFY that element response-plan-id exists within each instance of fEUMsg.FEU.other-references.other-reference.split-event
Step 99.1.2.1.6 VERIFY that element response-plan-id exists within each instance of fEUMsg.FEU.other-references.other-reference.merged-event
Step 99.1.2.1.7 VERIFY that element response-plan-id exists within each instance of fEUMsg.FEU.other-references.other-reference.sibling-event
Step 99.1.2.2 IF TMDD_N8R82_Event_Headline_Element_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 99.1.2.2.1 VERIFY that element headline-element exists within each instance of fEUMsg.FEU.event-headline
Step 99.1.2.3 IF TMDD_N8R85_Event_Valid_Period_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 99.1.2.3.1 VERIFY that element valid-period exists within each instance of fEUMsg.FEU.event-element-details.event-element-detail.event-times
Step 99.1.2.4 IF TMDD_N8R86_Required_Event_Effective_Period_Information_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 99.1.2.4.1 VERIFY that element days-of-the-week exists within each instance of fEUMsg.FEU.event-element-details.event-element-detail.event-times.valid-period.effective-periods.effective-period
